inn1.comm: pushed back down the track.
drives and misses outside the off stump, was looking to drive and playing the wrong line.
a tentative push and down to third man for couple of runs and Zimbabwe are on the way.
length delivery outside the off stump, once again drives down the wrong line, the ball beats the outside edge and through to the keeper.
turns it behind square leg for a single.
mistimes the cut to the off side.
mistimes the drive to mid-on.
full delivery outside the off stump and Masakadza drives along the ground to mid-off.
lovely delivery, swinging away slightly and Masakadza watches it closely and lets it go.
lovely delivery once again, moving away, left alone through to Rahim.
back of a length delivery and Masakadza looks to cut and the ball drops just short of the short cover fielder.
works it off his pads and through midwicket and the ball races along the turf, fielders chasing it cannot stop it.
length delivery and Chibhabha opens the face off the bat and steers it down to third man.
drives on the up to mid-off.
edges and there is no slip in place, goes past the keeper to third man fence.
back of a length delivery and Masakadza works to the short midwicket fielder.
defended with an angled bat to point.
on the leg stump and Masakadza whips it through square leg and no stopping that.
lovely forcing shot of the back foot, that races to the cover fence.
plays and misses outside the off stump, not much of the feet moving.
punches off the back foot to extra cover, half stopped by the fielder.
on the legs and Masakadza is too strong there and he works it through midwicket for another boundary.
lovely drive through the covers, wonderful timing, he puts his left foot forward and drives well to the fence.
fuller and moving away slightly, Masakadza looking to drive down the ground, misses it and through to the keeper, that was close to the off stump as well.
plays with an angled bat to point.
quicker delivery, the arm ball, Chibhabha plays it back.
comes forward and defends to the onside to short midwicket.
moves forward and drives to extra cover.
comes forward and drives it back to the bowler.
keeps a bit low, moves back and plays down the ground to long off for a single.
pushed to the onside.
short and Chibhabha picks it up and pulls well in gap to midwicket fence.
slower delivery and watched well by Chibhabha and pushed along the ground to cover.
short ball and pulled away along the ground to deep midwicket.
another slower delivery and an inside edge onto the pad and then on the track.
drives to mid-on.
tossed up delivery and driven to mid-off.
pushes to mid-on.
on the legs and worked through square leg, Naeem oversteps and it is a Free hit
Swings at the free hit delivery to deep backward square leg, poor running, they get a single.
uses his feet and drives well, Shakib at extra cover moves quickly and dives to save runs, wonderful work.
worked to the onside.
moves back and punches down the ground to long on for a single.
pushes to extra cover along the ground.
full delivery squeezed out square of the wicket on the off side.
another full delivery on the legs and driven to long on.
moves forward and drives to long off for a single.
goes all the way, wonderful use of the feet to the pitch of the ball and lofts it and over the wide long on fence for maximum.
works it forward of square leg to the deep for a single.
moves forward and drives to cover.
uses his feet and pushes to mid-on, takes off for a tight single.
comes forward and pushes to short midwicket.
mistimes the drive back to the bowler.
comes forward and drives along the track back to Shakib.
moves back and forces to extra cover, good fielding.
comes forward and takes it on the pad.
moves back and mistimes the shot back to the bowler.
drives through mid-off and down the ground for a single.
gives some room and cuts hard, gets a thickish outside edge to backward point fence.
comes forward and takes it on the pad.
pushes on the front foot to extra cover.
down the track and drives to mid-on, the ball not picked up cleanly by the fielder, would have been close.
moves forward and drives to mid-on.
plays to the onside.
too short, a long hop, Chibhabha moves back and punches through extra cover for a boundary.
worked through the onside for a single.
first breakthrough for Bangladesh, Masakadza sweeps and the ball strikes the pad outside the line, loud shout and given, the batsman is unlucky.
moves forward and drives to mid-off.
flat delivery and forces to extra cover.
moves back and pushes down the track.
moves back and forces off the back foot through extra cover for the 11th boundary of the match.
no timing as he looks to cut, goes to point.
moves back and plays to extra cover.
gives it a little bit more air, just giving Taylor that much more time to push it to long-on for a single
drifts down the leg stump. Chibhabha looks to play it away behind square but gets a pad and runs across for a leg bye
on the leg stump. Taylor turns it away to leg side for a single
pushes it to long-on for a single
tight line there as he bowls a flat delivery on the off stump as Taylor defends
pushes to long-on for a single
spears one into the middle stump. Taylor comes forward and defends it to cover
fuller length delivery on the off stump. Taylor defends it back onto the pitch
on the off stump. Taylor pushes it back to the bowler
on the middle stump. Taylor pushes it to cover
outside off as Taylor comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
pushes back to the bowler and that's a maiden
on the middle and leg as Chibhabha moves across and pushes it to long-on for a single
turn from the middle stump as Taylor pushes it to midwicket for a single
on the off and middle as Taylor pushes it to the leg side
gives it a little more air as Taylor comes down the track and is beaten by the flight. Nevertheless he goes for his shot and manages to clear the mid-off fielder and gets a boundary
on the leg stump as Taylor turns it away to midwicket for a single
fuller on the off stump as Taylor pushes it to cover and runs across for a single
outside the off stump. Chibhabha pushes it back to the bowler
and on the middle stump. Chibhabha does the same as he pushes it back to the bowler
outside the off stump. Chibhabha pushes it to cover
turned to the leg side for a single
on the off stump. Taylor pushes it to long-off for a single and retains the strike
on the off and middle. Taylor remains glued to the crease and reaches out for the delivery as he pushes it to long-on for a single
short outside the off-stump. Chibhabha drives it to deep point for a single
fuller on the middle and leg as Taylor moves across and pushes it to long-on for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Chibhabha pushes it to cover
on the middle and leg as Chibhabha pushes it to leg side
fuller outside the off stump. Chibhabha pushes it to long-off for a single
on the leg and middle as Chibhabha pushes it to midwicket for a single
on the middle stump. Taylor breaks the shackles with a sweep to fine-leg for a boundary
outside the off stump. Taylor defends to cover
pushed into the middle stump. Taylor defends it back onto the pitch
pushed back to the bowler
fuller outside the off stump. Taylor pushes it to long-off to retain the strike
driven down the ground to long on.
defended to the onside.
moves back and looks to turn it, taken on the pad.
works it to long leg for a single.
off the pad and on the onside, taken by the keeper and an appeal for a catch turned down.
worked to the onside.
moves back and punches to extra cover.
moves forward and drives to mid-on.
plays and misses outside the off stump.
comes forward and defends to mid-on.
well forward and defends down the track.
moves back and works it through square leg.
moves back and plays square of the wicket on the off side.
driven down the ground to long off.
uses his feet and pushes down the ground to long on.
pushes it back to bowler and sloppy fielding by Ashraful.

quicker delivery outside the off stump and Chibhabha playing forward gets beaten by the straight delivery and drags his feet from the crease and Rahim does the rest, gets rid of the bails. Good knock from Chibhabha comes to an end.
comes forward and plays to point.
lovely delivery from Razzak, pitches on the leg stump and knocks the top of off stump, Taylor does not play for the turn and gets beaten.
similar delivery and Coventry watches for the turn and plays it down the track.
blocked to the off side.
off the pad and behind the wicket on the onside.
another one bites the dust, the spinners are on top, pitches on the stump and spins across, the ball takes the edge and Junaid Siddiqui at first slip takes the catch on his second attempt.
pushes through the off side for a single.
driven down the ground to long on for a single.
turns it to square leg, Taibu calls and then says no, Matsikenyeri has to rush back into the crease.
played back to the bowler.
in the slot for Taibu, who moves to the pitch off the ball and drives through extra cover for a boundary.
worked to midwicket.
moves forward and works behind square leg.
works to square leg.
works it behind square leg.
uses his feet and defends to the onside.
moves forward and drives square of the wicket to the deep.
sweeps to short fine leg.
quicker delivery pushed to the off side.
a long hop and Taibu rocks back and pulls it high and over the midwicket fence for maximum.
played to short third man.
driven down the ground to long on.
uses his feet well and drives to long on for a single.
works it forward of square leg to the deep.
works it through midwicket.
mistimed to mid-on.
stands in the crease and plays back to the bowler.
a leading edge to the onside.
moves forward and drives to long off.
drives to extra cover.
comes forward and plays to extra cover.
spins down the leg side, signalled a wide and they get a single as well.
uses his feet and drives down the ground to long off.
driven to mid-on, good work by Raqibul.
uses his feet and takes it on the full and drives to deep extra cover.
tossed up full way outside the off stump, pushed to the off side.
played back along the track.
defended to the onside and Ashraful moves across to field the ball.
uses his feet and mistimes to midwicket.
worked to the onside.
defended back to the bowler.
moves back and cuts hard to deep extra cover, the fielder running around cannot stop it, that was hit well.
comes forward and defends to mid-on.
works it behind square leg to the deep for a single.
uses his feet well and drives down the ground to long off.
moves back and plays back to the bowler.
comes forward and defends to the bowler.
looking to lap it around, edges.
driven to long off.
played back to the bowler.
good length delivery and Taibu defends down the track.
down the leg side and played through square leg.
short ball and tucked away to long leg for a single.
pushes back to the bowler.
driven to mid-off.
slower delivery and going down the leg side, strikes the pad, question asked and turned down.
on the middle and leg. Looks to work it away but is struck on top of his pad and has to stay rooted to the crease
outside the off stump and Matsikenyeri looks to paddle it away but is struck on the helmet grill
outside off. Matsikenyeri comes down the track and pushes it back to the bowler

dropped !!! We see Rahim egging on his mates but when a chance comes to pick a wicket he is the one who is found wanting as he fails to take a straight forward edge from a delivery pitching on off stump and taking the outside edge
pushed to leg side
gone! This time Rahim picks the edge as Matsikenyeri edges a fuller delivery to Rahim, who makes no mistakes this time
pushes to mid-off
outside the off stump. Taibu pushes it to mid-off
outside the off stump and short in length as Taibu comes forward and pushes it to sweeper on the off side for a single
outside the off stump. Waller pushes it to point
and short outside the off stump. Waller repeats the shot from the previous ball
outside the off stump. Waller comes forward and pushes it to the left of the point fielder
on the off stump. Taibu pushes it to long-on for a single
outside the off stump. Waller is beaten in the flight as he gets an inside-edge to midwicket
fuller on the middle stump. Waller pushes it to long-on to get off the mark
wide down the leg side
on the middle stump and flighted well as Taibu comes down the track and lofts it to long-on for a single
defends on the front-foot to a delivery pitched outside the off stump
on the leg stump. Waller turns it away to short fine-leg for a single
short delivery outside the off stump. Waller stands tall and pushes it to the fielder at mid-off
full-toss coming swerving in and looked like a slower ball. Waller reaches out and flicks it to deep square leg for a single
full-toss down the leg side as Taibu tries to play it away and misses. It's called a wide
fuller on the middle and leg as Taibu comes forward and pushes it to mid-on

was that a drop ? Nazmul bowls one on the off stump and gets to move it back in. Taibu is looking to play it away on the leg side and gets a leading edge back to the bowler, who does a very good job in diving to his left in his follow-through. Not technically a drop but can still qualify as a chance
outside the off stump. Taibu pushes it to cover
on the off stump. Taibu plays it back onto the pitch
outside the off stump. Waller comes forward and looks to defend but the ball takes the outside edge and goes to the point fielder
short outside the off stump. Waller rocks back and cuts it away to deep point. Crowd were interested as it looked that Waller would be struggling but in the end makes it comfortably for a couple
outside off. Pushes it to cover for a single
Switch-hit! Taibu switches his stance and forces it to deep point for a couple
dropped by Nazmul as Taibu does the switch-hit again and flies straight to sweeper on the off-side
outside off. Waller defends it back onto the pitch
outside the off stump. Taibu pushes it to sweeper on the off side, this time traditionally as he gets a couple
fuller outside the off stump. Taibu comes forward and pushes it to cover
short ball on the middle stump and slower one too. Taibu picks it and hoicks it to deep midwicket with no power and gets a single
bouncer on the middle stump. Waller has to just swerve out of the way
fuller outside the off stump. Waller takes the front foot out of the way and lofts it away to extra-cover boundary
taking full-toll now as Nazmul pitches it short and Waller, capitalises, as he pulls it away to deep mid-wicket for a boundary
on the leg stump as Taibu plays it away to deep square leg for a single
Waller stretching himself now as he picks a long-hop from Ashraful and lofts it high and handsome over deep midwicket for a six
outside the off stump. Waller drives it to long-off for a single
on the middle and Taibu pushes it to leg side for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Waller shouts "Two, Two" as he is running but good fielding by Tamim at long-off keeps them down to a single
on the leg stump as Taibu pushes it away to deep square leg for a single
outside the off stump. Taibu smashes it to the left of the the fielder at sweeper on the off-side for a couple
back of a length delivery as Taibu pushes it to cover fielder
again the same delivery and the same fielder comes back into action
short on the off stump. Taibu waits for the delivery and pulls it to the fielder at long-on for a single
outside the off stump. Waller goes for his shot to long-off. He gets an outside edge to third man for a single
good length delivery outside the off stump. Taibu comes forward and pushes it to mid-off
on the leg stump and struck on the pads as they run across for a leg-bye
full-toss outside off. Taibu lofts it tolong-on for a single
outside the off stump. Waller opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man for a single
pushes to long-off for a single
wide down the leg side
outside the off stump. Waller comes forward and pushes it to cover
flighted delivery on the off stump. Waller comes down the track and lofts it away to the long-on boundary. Remember the batting Powerplay is yet to be taken
fuller on the off stump. Taibu looks to drive it onthe off side but gets an inside-edge onto his toes and a single is taken
fuller outside the off stump. Waller pushes it to point
slower ball outside the off stump as Waller cuts it to the left of the fielder at point for a single
on the leg stump. Taibu plays it away to short fine-leg for a single
inside-edge to point for a single
pushes to long-on for a single
outside the off stump. Taibu stands tall and pushes it back to the bowler

was that a lapse in concentration or sheer tiredness as Taibu reaches out for the delivery and deposits it straight into the hands of the fielder, Raqibul at deep midwicket. He was looking good for some more runs but then...
on the leg stump as Waller turns it away to midwicket for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Chigumbara drives it to long-off for a single
dropped again as Waller scoops a delivery straight to Dolar at sweeper who does the unthinkable by dropping a sitter. If Waller goes on to get a big score, we know whom to blame
fuller on the middle stump. Chigumbara pushes it to short fine-leg for a single
full-toss on the middle and off as Chigumbara drives it to long-off for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Waller looks to flay it away but is beaten
fuller outside the off stump. Waller waits for the delivery and runs it down to third-man fence. Sheer timing on the stroke
what a spell of six balls for Dolar! He bowls a beamer on the middle and leg. Beats Rahim and runs away to the fence
pushed to cover for a single
outside the off stump and fuller in length. Chigumbara pushes it to cover
a beamer again and he is quick to apologise as the ball hits Chigumbara on the helmet and they run across for a leg-bye. Dolar won't be able to bowl anymore as he has bowled two beamers
comes forward and defends
fuller on the off stump. Chigumbara lofts it away to long-on for a single
on the off stump. Waller comes down the track and pushes it wide off the long-off fielder and runs across for a couple
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
outside the off stump. Waller opens the face of the bat and runs across for a single
outside off. Chigumbara pushes to cover and runs across for a single
punches off the back foot to extra cover, a slight misfield.
lovely delivery from Razzak, pitches on the leg stump and turns to take the off and middle, as Waller plays down the wrong line.
nurdles to short fine leg.
forces off the back foot to cover.
cuts hard but picks out the fielder at point.
inside edges as Cremer pushes forward.
fuller outside the off stump. chigumbara lofts it to the right of the long-off fielder. Good fielding keeps them down to a single
on the leg stump. Cremer turns it away to short fine-leg for a single
beats everyone and everything around the stumps as the ball runs away for four byes. But what a delivery as it pitches on the middle and splits Chigumbara into half
pushes it to long-on for a single
short outside the off stump. Chigumbara cuts it to cover
outside the off stump and turns it away from the batsman as he is beaten all ends up
straight delivery outside the off stump. Cremer looks to cut it away and is beaten

and strikes the timber with an arm-ball. Cremer was looking to cut it away and is beaten by the bounce. He would have been better off playing straight of all the three balls in the over. What's the use of crying over split milk
pads to a delivery pitching on the leg stump
fuller on the middle stump. Price turns it away to the leg side for a single
off the pads to short fine-leg but Chigumbara does not run
on the off stump. Price comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
spins it across the batsman as Price looks to flay it on the off-side and is beaten
inept fielding again as Shakib manages to get Price to top-edge a delivery and the ball falls in middle of the three fielders converging at deep mid-wicket but none of them gets a hand onto it
and Chigumbara is gone! Frustrated by the lack of runs in the powerplay, he decides to take the aerial route and only manages a leading edge to Mahmudullah at mid-ff. Shakib is ecstatic
pushes to leg side for a single
on the off stump. Jarvis comes forward and pushes it to the bowler
short on the middle stump. Price pulls it away to midwicket for a single
five-for there! Razzaq gets one right in front of the middle stump and traps Jarvis right in front and he is brimming with joy as he gets his second five wicket haul and he knows it

inn2.comm: short ball. Tamim pulls it away to deep midwicket. The ball falls short of the deep midwicket and drops dead. Tamim gets a couple
fuller on the off stump. Tamim defends it back onto the pitch
short on the middle stump. Tamim rocks back and pulls it away to deep midwicket for a boundary
outside the off stump and fuller in length. Tamim looks to drive it away and is beaten
outside the off stump and beaten again
fuller outside the off stump. Tamim gets the bat on the ball and sends it scurrying across cover for a boundary. Super shot that
Welcome to the show, Chigumbara! Pitches it short and Junaid takes full toll of it as he pulls it away to deep midwicket for a six
short outside the off stump. Junaid runs it down to third man for a single
fuller on the middle and leg as Tamim lofts it to long-on for a couple
good length delivery outside the off stump as Tamim comes forward and pushes it to the cover fielder
short outside the off stump. Tamim plays a shot akin to double handed backhand in tennis as he clears the ropes at long-off with ease
good length delivery outside the off stump. Tamim comes forward and pushes it wide of the fielder at sweeper on the off-side for a couple
short and pulled away to deep midwicket for a boundary. With that shot he has sent the crowd into a shouting frenzy
fuller outside the off stump. Junaid drives it to point
good length on the middle and leg as Junaid defends it to square-leg. Tamim is quick to shout a loud "no"
crowd in raptures now as Junaid moves across and pulls a good length delivery to a boundary. A diving fielder at sweeper on the leg side can't prevent the inevitable
a slower full-toss on the pads as Junaid casually flicks it away to deep square leg for a boundary
superb end to the over now as Junaid moves across and creams a drive past the diving mid-off fielder for a boundary. Crowd goes berserk with that shot
on the leg stump. Tamim closes the face of the bat and pushes it to square leg for a single
on the middle stump. Junaid comes forward and pushes the slower ball to midwicket
on the middle and off. Junaid comes forward and pushes it to mid-on
good length delivery outside the off stump. Junaid lets the ball come onto him as he presents a dead bat
crowd goes silent as Chigumbara takes a gift offered to him by Junaid. He bowls one on the off stump as Junaid looks to flick it away and manages to get a leading edge back to Chigumbara
on the middle and coming in. Ashraful moves across and pushes it to deep square leg for a single
outside the off stump. Ashraful opens the face of the bat and steers it away to third man for a single
outside the off stump and Tamim gets onto the back foot and pushes it back to the bowler
outside the off stump and coming into Tamim. Tamim does well to get behind the line and defends comfortably
fuller outside the off stump, Tamim lofts it over mid-off  but not quite convincingly as he gets a couple
fuller outside the off stump. Tamim unfurls the drive but superb fielding by Chibhabha on his follow-through prevents a certain boundary
short outside the off stump. Tamim pulls but no timing on it as he gets a single
wide down the leg side and Tamim runs across for a couple of runs making it three in total and bringing the fifty up
wide down the leg side again
good length delivery, which Tamim pushes to long-on. Fielder running across from mid-on keeps them down to a single
short on the middle stump. Ashraful comes forward and presents the full face of the bat
and again the same
short outside the off stump. Ashraful cuts it away to deep point for a single
short in length and slower in pace as Tamim has to adjust at the last moment. He pulls it away to deep midwicket for a single

now how many times have we seen this? Ashraful standing rooted to the crease and flaying at a delivery. To add to the woes he manages to get an outside edge too. He has striked off that kind of dismissal one more time

now this is sheer irresponsibility on part of Tamim as he looks to pull a short delivery and gets a top edge, which is taken comfortably by Masakadza at mid-off. He will be in for a dressing down from the people who matter
outside the off stump and left alone by Raqibul
outside the off stump. Raqibul comes forward and pushes it to cover
fuller on the middle and leg. Raqibul comes forward and drives it to mid-on
on the off stump and fuller in length as Raqibul pushes it to mid-off
fuller outside the off stump. Raqibul pushes it to extra cover and sets off for a single
short outside the off stump. Raqibul lets it pass to the keeper
outside the off stump and coming into the batsman as Raqibul comes forward and pushes it to cover
fuller outside the off stump. Raqibul comes forward and pushes it to cover again
fuller on the middle and leg as Raqibul moves across and pushes it to midwicket
fuller outside the off stump. Raqibul comes forward and pushes it to short cover
good length delivery outside the off stump. Raqibul moves across and opens the face of the bat. He steers it to short third man
width offered outside the off stump. Shakib moves across and looks to cut it away but gets a bottom edge to point
wide outside the off stump
fuller in length outside the off stump. Shakib lets it pass as it was very nearly a wide
short outside the off stump. Shakib moves across and looks to cut it away. He gets a bottom edge to point
short and wide outside the off stump. Shakib stands tall and cuts it away over the fielder at point for a boundary
good length delivery outside the off stump. Shakib comes forward and pushes it to mid-off
short outside the off stump. Shakib cuts it to deep point for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Shakib drives it to deep point for a single
short outside the off stump. Raqibul gets behind the line and pushes it to point
fuller outside the off stump. Raqibul comes forward and pushes it to cover fielder. He seems set to play the sheet anchor role now
fuller outside the off stump. Raqibul comes forward and drives. Mpofu, substituting for Taibu at mid-off fields with butter fingers and allows a boundary
on the middle stump and drifting down the leg stump. Chigumbara is lucky to get away without it being called a wide
outside the off stump and left alone by Raqibul
short outside the off stump. Shakib rocks onto the back foot and chops it past the diving backward point fielder, Price for a boundary
the crowd is coming roaring back into the match as Shakib upper-cuts a short delivery over the ropes at point fence. Shakib needs to make a contribution to see Bangladesh through
outside the off stump and comes back in to Shakib, who is sliced into half. What's depressing for Jarvis is that the keeper is also beaten and concedes four byes
outside the off stump. Shakib comes forward and pushes it to mid-off
on the middle stump. Shakib moves across and pushes it to midwicket
outside the off stump and short in length. Shakib looks to cut it away and is beaten
outside the off stump. Raqibul comes forward in an attempt to drive it to long-off but gets an inside edge to long-on and runs across for a single
on the off stump. Shakib comes forward and pushes it to midwicket for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Raqibul comes forward and pushes it to cover
outside the off stump. Raqibul is on an auto-pilot mode now as he pushes it to cover
good length delivery outside the off stump. Raqibul square drives past the point fielder for a boundary
good length outside the off stump. Raqibul steers it to short third-man for a single
fuller on the off and middle. Raqibul gets his bat down in time to get an inside edge to fine-leg for a single
good length delivery outside the off stump. Shakib drives it to mid-off
Jarvis oversteps and bowls one short outside the off stump. Shakib cuts it to point
fuller outside the off stump. Shakib, wielding the bat like some mythological character looks to swing it away and is beaten
short outside the off stump. Shakib rocks back and cuts it away to point for a boundary
fuller outside off. Comes forward and defends
comes forward and defends yet again
short outside the off stump. Raqibul runs it down to third man for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Shakib looks to drive it away and gets a bottom edge to cover
pushes it to mid-on
outside the off stump. Shakib gets onto the front foot and drives it wide of the fielder at mid-on for a single
good length delivery on the off and middle. Raqibul gets behind the line of the delivery and defends
short outside the off stump. Raqibul has an almighty swing and gets an outside edge through the vacant first slip region for a boundary
fuller outside the off stump. Shakib pushes it to mid-on
on the off and middle. Raqibul comes forward and defends it to cover
fuller length delivery outside the off stump. Raqibul comes down the track and pushes it to long-off for a single
gets turn from the pitch as Shakib adjusts to it and pushes it to midwicket
on the off stump. Price comes down the track and pushes it to long-on for a single
on the leg stump and struck on the pads
short outside the off stump. Shakib is comfortable with these deliveries as he rocks back and cuts it away past point for a boundary
on the middle and leg. Shakib moves across and pushes it to midwicket
short outside the off stump. Shakib rocks back and pulls it to deep midwicket for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Raqibul drives it away to sweeper and exceptional fielding by Mpofu prevents a boundary
outside the off stump. Raqibul comes forward and pushes it to point
short outside the off stump. Raqibul cuts it to deep point for a single
fuller on the middle and leg. Raqibul comes forward and defends
full-toss on the middle and leg. Raqibul comes forward and lofts it away to deep midwicket for a boundary
wide down the leg side
fuller outside the off stump. Raqibul comes down the track and drives it to long-off for a single
outside the off stump. Shakib comes forward and defends
outside the off stump. Shakib comes down the track and is struck on the pads
on the middle stump and fuller in length. Shakib pushes it to long-on for a single
short on the middle and leg. Shakib rocks back and pulls it away to deep square leg for a couple
short and slower on the middle stump. Shakib pulls it away to deep midwicket for a single
outside the off stump. Raqibul gets behind the line of the delivery and defends it
short outside the off stump. Raqibul once again gets behind the line of the delivery and defends
short outside the off stump. Raqibul looks to drive it away but is beaten by the away movement
short outside the off stump to begin with as Shakib rocks back and cuts it past a diving cover fielder for a boundary
fuller outside the off stump. Shakib drives it to long-off for a single
on the leg stump. Raqibul comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
on the leg stump. Raqibul gets onto the back foot and pushes it to square leg
on the leg stump yet again as Raqibul pushes it behind square for a single
good length delivery outside the off stump. Shakib comes forward and pushes it to cover
on the middle and leg. Raqibul looks to work it away but is struck on the pads
outside the off stump. Raqibul solidly gets behind the line of the delivery and defends
fuller length delivery on the off and middle. Raqibul drives but gets an inside edge to mid-on for a single
short outside the off stump and width offered. Shakib drives it to the fielder at sweeper boundary for a single
fuller on the middle stump. Raqibul comes forward and pushes it to mid-on
flipper on the off stump. Shakib waits for the delivery and drives it to long-off for a single
fuller on the off stump. Raqibul takes the front foot out of the way and drives it to sweeper cover for a couple
comes forward and defends
cut to short third man
fuller outside the off stump. Raqibul drives it back to the bowler
tossed up and he hits it in the air just in front of mid-on, turned the face and played a loose shot but safely wide of the fielder place there
slow on the pads and turned away in front of square
flatter one, again worked to the leg side, this time more toward midwicket, Cremer runs across and collects and returns to other end but just misses
again on the pads, turns in and spins down
uses his feet and punches it down to mid-off for one
comes out as well and hits a nice and tall straight drive past Price, long-on collects and throws, its a wide throw to Price who passes it on where the batsman and keeper collide
terrible ball, a mile down the leg side and it goes through the keeper
better ball to end the over, arm ball on the stumps and defended
nice loopy delivery outside off and Shakib duly drives it past extra cover in style, it was in the zone and he dispatched it nicely
again outside off, a no-ball to boot, slapped hard between cover and point where the misfield allows four ... not much going Zimbabwe's way at the moment .. and that's Shakib's half-century
tries to unsettle him with a bouncer but Shakid arches back and uppercuts the ball over point and cover for four more
driven out to the deep where Mpofu fields at deep cover-point
flatter and shorter and punched off the back foot to extra cover
another poor ball well outside the pads, wide called
looped up on the off stump, Raqibul drives nicely to mid-off
flighted on middle and leg, he gets inside the line and punches it
short outside off, Shakib rocks back to pull but ends up flat-batting it to Price's right and down to long-off for one
nice ball, tossed up on a length to get Raqibul defending
a tad straighter with some drift on it but Raqibul on-drives a single
likes the fuller length on this one and heaves it between midwicket and mid-on for four more
that is maximum for Shakib, who again goes for a big swipe across the line, mistimes it a bit as his head goes up but the ball is hit hard enough to beat long-on
now that is a good shot! Third time in a row Shakib takes on a tossed up delivery outside off, collecting from where it pitches and swinging hard, and this one is dumped behind square leg
on the pads and turned away to square leg
pitches on a length outside off and he defends to cover
goes to uppercut a short ball but fails to connect
on the pads, flicked to Chibhabha at midwicket, Shakib sets off but gets shooed back by a frantic Raqibul
slides down the pads and wide called
good ball, pitches it up on off, Raqibul just pushes it wide of Chigumbura and sets off in a hurry but has to return as the fielder harries
back of a length, stands up and pushes it back Chigumbura

big swing to one angling in to middle and leg, there's a noise as he misses on the shot, the ball rolls off his thighs down toward third man, Jarvis appeals but it is turned down as the umpire reckons the ball was going to miss leg stump
too fine and he works it off his pads for a single
on middle and off and turned to midwicket for another single
oversteps, servers up a full toss, Shakib swats at it and sends it back past the bowler to long-off and we have a free hit coming up
good ball, right in the blockhole and Shakib gets back and squeezes it out between cover and point for a single
short outside off but he miscues the attempted cut, getting a bit of an under-edge on the shot
flays the bat at a wide half-volley and slashes it over point, the ball drops in no man's land and Matsikenyeri does well in the deep
reaches out and drives in the air, somehow managing to beat cover and mid-off
heaves at a full ball outside off and inside-edges to midwicket
leans into a drive to a good-length ball and punches it back
reaches out and mistimes a square drive to cover
straighter ball cramps him up and he turns it to midwicket
fuller ball and he drives it out to deep cover for a single
good length on off, rolls the fingers over the ball, Raqibul defends
shorter ball on middle and off, he gets up and turns it away for one
short, too slow, sits up nicely and Shakib pulls over midwicket
bang, that's four! In the slot to be driven outside off and Shakib punches it fiercely back past the bowler
slapped! That is a bad ball, short and wide and a no-ball so Shakib stands up cuts between cover and point and the sweeper cannot get there in time
full on the stumps, swatted to midwicket
nice ball again, very full in the blockhole and punched back
slow bouncer outside off and Raqibul ducks, wide called for height
short of a length, he opens the face and steers it to third man
short of a length, he goes back and punches to cover
nice and straight, Shakib backs away but cannot beat cover
comes dancing out to try and throw the bowler off line, swats at a short ball and just mistimes it wide of mid-on, Waller runs in from long-on and dives but the ball drops short and ricochets away
full outside off, Shakib moves to 97 with a punch to extra cover
once again he just defends to ensure Shakib gets to face
good ball, cramps him for room with the length and Shakib gets up to punch the ball out to the deep, its an easy single but they have a good think before taking it and decide not to in the end

and there it is! Hundred No. 4 for Shakib! The crowd comes to its feet as Shakib reaches out and squeezes a wide ball down to third man and brings up three figures, it has been a very good innings from the captain
all over! Shakib makes room and punches another full ball over the infield and Bangladesh have leveled the series at 1-1 in front of a raucous home crowd
